name: David PARDIGOL
label: Mechanical Engineer specialized in AI & Data Science
summary: I'm working as a mechanical engineer in the nuclear industry, specializing in structural analysis and data science. I have a strong background in Finite Element Modeling and Computational Mechanics, combined with expertise in AI and Machine Learning techniques. I'm passionate about leveraging data-driven approaches to solve complex engineering problems and optimize processes within the nuclear sector.

work_experience.summary: Mechanical engineering, Finite Element Modeling, AI and Data Science applied to the nuclear industry.
highlights: Advanced Structural Analysis and Mechanical Design of Nuclear Components
Post-processing of industrial Finite Element models
Development of software tools in Python for data analysis and automation of engineering tasks
Statistical analysis and machine learning for sensitivity analysis and uncertainty quantification

projects.title: Mentor — Machine Learning Intern — Framatome
projects.summary: Satistical analysis on thermal loads applied to primary loop piping systems in nuclear power plants
highlights: Parametrization of thermal loads based on operational data
Clustering of thermal load patterns using unsupervised learning techniques
Maximal stress prediction using supervised learning algorithms

degrees: Minor in Finite Element Modeling and Computational Mechanics
Specialization in Data Science and Machine Learning
